channel.title: Sustainability on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Sustainability on PlaceOS

item.title: ASHRAE Headquarters - Net-Zero Retrofit
item.description: ASHRAE is a global society maintaining sustainable standards for the built environment. They are the creator of BACnet, a protocol and set of standards for the HVAC industry.

item.title: A Guide to Energy Data Collection & Utilization
item.description: How to collect energy data in commercial buildings so that you can find out where you’re wasting energy like powering empty spaces.

item.title: Webinar: Campus Management Systems with Cisco Meraki
item.description: Learn how campus management systems leverage occupancy data like Cisco Meraki so that you’re not powering empty classrooms on campus.

item.title: Partnership announcement with Monstarlab
item.description: We are proud to announce our official partnership with global digital consultancy Monstarlab! The partnership will help build

item.title: Enhancing Commercial Building Sustainability in a Hybrid Workplace
item.description: Explore sustainable practices for hybrid workplaces in commercial buildings. Find out how to reduce energy usage and promote a greener work environment.

item.title: How BMS Improve Commercial Building Sustainability
item.description: Explore new integrations that enhance ESG and sustainability in commercial buildings. Achieve your energy reduction goals and sustainability targets today!

item.title: LIVE EVENT: Rethinking Campus Experience
item.description: Discover smart campus solutions to enhance the campus experience. Learn how a campus app can streamline operations and improve student engagement.

item.title: £93bn of Commercial Real Estate is at Risk, Here’s What To Do
item.description: Unlocking sustainability: UK’s mandate & PlaceOS’s smart energy solutions reshape real estate’s future.

item.title: Everybody Needs Good NABERS: The Missing Energy Metric
item.description: There’s a SINGLE metric that could improve every office’s energy efficiency in the country.And they’re not measuring it…

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Occupancy-Based Energy Automation
item.description: A live demonstration about Occupancy-Based Energy Automation, Our AI Roadmap & New Room Booking Features
